section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: A private vehicle-for-hire, as that term is defined in ยง 50-301.03(16A); or
A public vehicle-for-hire, as that term is defined in ยง 50-301.03(17).
"Wheelchair-accessible vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in ยง 50-301.03(32).
